translations: n.<英>有轨电车；<史>（煤矿用的）煤车，矿车

sentences.sentence: In 1882, the city's first electric tram cars went into service.
No money can be spent on the construction and operation of the tram.
sentences.translation: 没有钱可以用于有轨电车的建设和运行。

sentences.sentence: The project will also upgrade existing tram lines and bicycle paths.
sentences.translation: 该项目还将改善现有的电车线和自行车道。
